page.title: 12The Brambles Play Area cont
page.content: to improve the estate in several ways, the major improvement being the planning of an adventure playground. It was to be called the Newlands Project. The play area was officially opened on August 16th 1984. The area is landscaped and very well designed for children of all ages. There are four play areas with pathways between, the ground being covered with a thick layer of wood chippings which are both safe and clean. Tha adventure play equipment is imaginatively designed and vandal-proof, our favourite piece being the realistic jeep made from tubular steel and real tyres. There are swings, wooden 'gym' equipment and a metal tank and helicopter for adventure play. There is a football pitch,concrete area,safe slides,seats, and litter bins.We enjoyed this survey
